disclaimerDesc1: This tool is not a money printing tool and contains risks.You are responsible for your own money and actions.
disclaimerDesc2: By using this tool you agree to take FULL responsibility of your own money. Even if this would mean missed opportunities caused by the algorithm of this bot or worse; losses. Be responsible, Only trade with money you can afford to lose.
takeChances: Take chances, Make mistakes, Get messy.... To the moon!
outsideClose: Tap outside this window to close this message
timeintervalInfo: The timeinterval is used when calculating the average price for a buy entry
averageInfo: The total amount of candles to take into the average price calculation
walletInfo: The total amount of your wallet which is being used to place buy orders
calcInfo: The buy entry is calculated based on the lowest average of the selected timeframe available in Binance., The total amount of candles to look for is taken into account aswell.
tooltipMargin: Difference between the buy entry and the sell entry
averageDistanceInfo: When set to 0% this will have no effect. When set higher than 0 the buy-in entry will be the lowest average price - (x)% of that price
ruleWallet: Provide a number between 1 and 100, (minimal amount of 10 dollar is required)
tooltipPanik: When active the bot dumps the current holdings above buy entry and stops buying new coins
tooltipOnline: When the bot is running this indicater will show that the bot is online
tooltipProfit: Shows the selected currency calculated as profit. A symbol not previously used by the bot will result into 0 profit
donation_hint: Your support means more than a thousand words
tooltipDownload: You can use the download button to download a backup which can be used to restore the bot if needed
tooltipRestore: You can upload a .pynance file to restore a previous version of the database
tooltipSecurity: Secure your bot with a master password. Once set you only can enter pynance with your master password.
masterpasswordInfo: You can only access the bot with your master password once set!
ruleMPWD: Create a password of atleast 10 characters
ruleMPWD2: Your master passwords are not the same
masterSure: Are you sure you want to set a master password, you will be unable to change this later
masterpasswordInput: Provide the master password that has been set previously
tryAgain: Something went wrong, please try again!
